title: Advanced Memory Forensics Challenge
description: Analyze a real memory dump to uncover hidden secrets in a corporate workstation incident.
hints: Focus on running processes and their command-line arguments.
Check for environment variables set by suspicious processes.
Explore memory sections for encrypted data.
learningObjectives: Understand how to use Volatility for memory forensics.
Learn to analyze process memory and environment variables.
Practice uncovering hidden data in memory dumps.
